articles.title: US job growth blows away expectations in December; unemployment rate falls to 4.1% - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. job growth unexpectedly accelerated in December while the unemployment rate fell to 4.1% as the labor market ended the year on a solid footing, reinforcing views that the Federal Reserve would keep interest rates unchanged this month.
